actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to expand the authority of the Veterans' Administration to make direct loans to veterans where private capital is unavailable at the statutory interest rate.

summary.text: Authorizes the Veterans' Administration to make direct housing loans to eligible veterans where private capital is unavailable at the statutory interest rate by designating rural areas, small cities and towns or various sectors of metropolitan areas as "housing credit shortage areas".

titles.title: A bill to expand the authority of the Veterans' Administration to make direct loans to veterans where private capital is unavailable at the statutory interest rate.
